title: Maximum Levels
content:
This indicator shows the maximum volume levels for the selected period.

To add and set up the indicator, open the Indicators settings window.


Indicator's settings

Calculation

NameDescription
Period Represents one of the available profile periods.

Options:
  • Current day
  • Last day
  • Current week
  • Last week
  • Current month
  • Last month
  • Contract
Trading session The trading session determines the period of instrument trading time for what the data should be displayed.
Type Represents one of the available data source types.

Options:
  • Bids
  • Ask
  • Positive delta
  • Negative Delta
  • Volume
  • Ticks

Visualization

NameDescription
Color Determines the color of the displayed line.
Width Determines the width of the displayed line.
Length Determines the length of the displayed line.
Axis text color Defines the text color for the price axis label.

Label

NameDescription
Text offset Sets the x-axis offset of the label in pixels.
Text Determines whether the text label should be displayed.
Custom text Defines the text in the displayed label.
Value Determines whether to display values in the label.
Color Sets the color of the label text.
Size Sets the font size.

Alerts

NameDescription
Use alerts This setting enables alert notifications for specific conditions or events as defined by the indicator. When activated, the indicator will send an alert.
Alert File This parameter allows users to specify the name of a custom audio file for alert sounds. Users can select a WAV file that will be played whenever an alert condition is triggered. The chosen WAV file should be located in the folder C:\Program Files (x86)\ATAS Platform\Sounds.
Font Color Sets the color of the text in the alert window.
Background Sets the background color of the alert window.
